videos.description: Brandon Allen pass complete to Drew Morgan for 20 yds for a TD
videos.headline: B. Allen pass,to D. Morgan for 20 yds for a TD

videos.description: Dak Prescott pass complete to Brandon Holloway for 38 yds for a TD

videos.description: Dak Prescott pass complete to Fred Ross for 26 yds to the Ark 19 for a 1ST down ARKANSAS Penalty, personal foul (Santos Ramirez) to the Ark 10 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: D. Prescott pass,to F. Ross for 26 yds for a 1ST down,ARKANSAS penalty, personal foul (S. Ramirez) for a 1ST down

videos.description: Dak Prescott pass complete to Fred Brown for 8 yds for a TD
videos.headline: D. Prescott pass,to F. Brown for 8 yds for a TD

videos.description: Mississippi State's Fred Ross makes a crazy one-handed catch, shakes off a defender and then jukes out another as he rolls into the end zone for a 55-yard touchdown.
videos.headline: Ross' nasty one-handed grab for 55-yard TD

videos.description: Brandon Allen pass complete to Jared Cornelius for 9 yds for a TD
videos.headline: B. Allen pass,to J. Cornelius for 9 yds for a TD

videos.description: Brandon Allen pass complete to Dominique Reed for 52 yds to the MisSt 13 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: B. Allen pass,to D. Reed for 52 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Brandon Allen pass complete to Jeremy Sprinkle for 10 yds for a TD
videos.headline: B. Allen pass,to J. Sprinkle for 10 yds for a TD

videos.description: Dak Prescott pass complete to Brandon Holloway for 45 yds to the Ark 19 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: D. Prescott pass,to B. Holloway for 45 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: In a wild back-and-forth battle, Dak Prescott puts Mississippi State back in the lead with his fifth touchdown pass of the game.
videos.headline: Prescott's 5th TD puts Bulldogs back in front

videos.description: Brandon Allen pass complete to Jared Cornelius for 17 yds to the Ark 28 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: B. Allen pass,to J. Cornelius for 17 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: Brandon Allen pass complete to Jared Cornelius for 18 yds to the MisSt 19 for a 1ST down
videos.headline: B. Allen pass,to J. Cornelius for 18 yds for a 1ST down

videos.description: In the final minute, Arkansas lines up for a go-ahead 29-yard field attempt, but Mississippi State's Beniquez Brown blocks the kick to preserve the 51-50 win for the Bulldogs.
videos.headline: Mississippi State blocks game-winning FG attempt
